app.name: Moonlight WiiU
app.short_description: A Moonlight port for the Nintendo WiiU
app.long_description: Moonlight Wii U is a port of Moonlight Embedded, which is an open source implementation of NVIDIA's GameStream, as used by the NVIDIA Shield. Moonlight Wii U allows you to stream your full collection of games from your powerful Windows desktop to your Wii U.
